name: lib/couchbase3.js
manager
description: You don't need to use this directly usually. Use the APIs below.

name: postWithoutId
description: Save data to DB without a given id.

return.description: Result is a promise with `[id, rev]` or an error.

name: postWithId
description: Save data to DB with a given id.

return.description: Result is a promise with `[id, rev]` or an error.

name: putWithId
description: Save data to DB with a given id.

return.description: Result is a promise with `[id, rev]` or an error.

name: destroyById
description: Destroy data from DB by id.

return.description: Result is a promise with whatever or an error.

name: findById
description: Find data from DB by id.

return.description: Result is a promise with the data or an error.

name: findAll
description: Find all data from DB for a model.

return.description: Result is a promise with an array of 0 to many `[id, data]`.

name: forDb
description: Convert data from model to DB format.

name: fromDb
description: Convert data from DB format to model.

params.name: data
params.description: What the Bucket would return with the OpCallback()

name: lib/utils.js
promisifyAllResolveWithReturn
description:
A special `promisifyAll`. The `openBucket()` method (in class `Cluster`) has both a return which
is the bucket, and a callback which is the error.
